subject: Affiliate Inquiry
description_text:
My name is Nate, and I represent Savage Sim Racing (SSR), a sim-racing
organization with a community of nearly 600 active drivers.

SSR operates endurance teams, leagues, and a structured development program
focused on helping newer drivers learn racecraft, preparation, and
consistency in a positive, team-first environment. A large portion of our
members are actively investing in sim-racing hardware, software, and
coaching as they progress.

We’re exploring potential affiliate partnerships and discount programs that
we could offer directly to our members. In return, we actively recommend
and direct drivers toward products we believe add real value to their
development and racing experience.

If this is something you’d be open to discussing, we’d be happy to share
more about our community and explore a mutually beneficial partnership.

Thank you for your time,
Nathaniel Halastik
Founder – Savage Sim Racing

conversations.body_text: Hi SavageSimRacingTeam,  We currently offer an affiliate commission program on our official website. You can register for a partner account to receive a unique referral link. Commissions are calculated based on sales volume, with tiered rates, and are settled on a monthly basis.
